item.description:
The end of the Summer and beginning of Fall deserve a very nice wine tasting to ease the transition!  This will be a blow out.  I am inviting the high end for head count this time.  I have a Rock and Roll band, FUN HOUSE, booked for the night out on the deck.  There will be a cover charge of $5 going to the band payable at the door.  Please try to have the correct amount.  They will start at 6 so it will be good to get here on time.  They will play until 9:30.

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine or 1.75MLsplease) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvre or desert. Please indicate what food item you want to bring when you sign up. If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more (750 ml) with your dish. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $25 or more depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste. Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing.

Reds - Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir.
Whites - sav blanc, chards, Riesling, pinot grigio, etc
Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a person's spot if you do not show up. If you must cancel, the earlier the better if there is a waiting list.
*Please note* The address and directions will be sent a few days prior to the event if you don't have it already to the entire "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence. It should go without saying to Drink Responsibly. I will have water and coffee too.
This is a multimeetup function to blow this out with a great party. Only sign up on one site if you belong to more than one for an accurate count unless you end up on a wait list.

Enjoy the night in fun, style and class.
**As always this is a multi group meetup and a BYOWG...bring your own wine glass!!  I have 60 but this may surpass that quantity.
This event if from 6pm - 10pm in Cheshire, CT.
item.how_to_find_us: Knock on the door - Ring the bell

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Wine night at Ralph's House in Cheshire
